attributes.action: Either enforce or repeal all statutes of law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The laws exist so that they can be used. Use (enforce) them, don't leave it to the discression of politicians or the police.

Keeping obsolete laws on the statute book as reserve powers, for use later, depending on circumstances, is dangerous and anti-democratic.

If there is no longer any intention or reason to use them they should be repealed.
